00023 #include <stdlib.h>
00024 #include <string.h>
00025 
00026 #include "pstack.hpp"
00027 
00028 namespace uStreamLib {
00029         PStack::PStack(void)
00030                 : Object(UOSUTIL_RTTI_PSTACK), m_ptrVoidItems(NULL), m_iStackPointer(0),
00031                 m_iSize(0)
00032         {
00033                 // nothing to do here
00034         }
00035 
00036         PStack::~PStack(void)
00037         {
00038                 // lock mutex
00039                 MutexLocker ml(&m_mutex);
00040 
00041                 // free memory
00042                 if (m_ptrVoidItems) {
00043                         ::free(m_ptrVoidItems);
00044                         m_ptrVoidItems = NULL;
00045                 }
00046         }
00047 
00048         int32 PStack::init(uint32 size)
00049         {
00050                 int32 ret = 0;
00051 
00052                 // initialize mutex
00053                 ret = m_mutex.init();
00054                 if (ret == FAILURE)
00055                         return FAILURE;
00056 
00057                 // initialize stack
00058                 m_ptrVoidItems = (void * *) malloc(size * sizeof(void *));
00059                 if (!m_ptrVoidItems)
00060                         return FAILURE;
00061 
00062                 m_iSize = size;
00063                 m_iStackPointer = -1;
00064 
00065                 // zeroize memory
00066                 memset(m_ptrVoidItems, 0, size * sizeof(void *));
00067 
00068                 // ok
00069                 setOk(true);
00070                 return SUCCESS;
00071         }
00072 
00073         int32 PStack::getStackPointer(void)
00074         {
00075                 MutexLocker ml(&m_mutex);
00076                 return m_iStackPointer;
00077         }
00078 
00079         void* PStack::getTop(void)
00080         {
00081                 MutexLocker ml(&m_mutex);
00082 
00083                 if (m_ptrVoidItems && m_iStackPointer >= 0)
00084                         return m_ptrVoidItems[m_iStackPointer];
00085 
00086                 return NULL;
00087         }
00088 
00089         int32 PStack::push(void* item)
00090         {
00091                 MutexLocker ml(&m_mutex);
00092                 int32 iBound = m_iSize - 1;
00093 
00094                 // check
00095                 if (!m_ptrVoidItems)
00096                         return NULL;
00097 
00098                 // increment stack pointer
00099                 m_iStackPointer++;
00100                 if (m_iStackPointer > iBound) {
00101                         m_iStackPointer = iBound;
00102                         return FAILURE;
00103                 }
00104 
00105                 // store pointer
00106                 m_ptrVoidItems[m_iStackPointer] = item;
00107 
00108                 // ok
00109                 return SUCCESS;
00110         }
00111 
00112         void* PStack::pop(void)
00113         {
00114                 MutexLocker ml(&m_mutex);
00115 
00116                 // check
00117                 if (!m_ptrVoidItems)
00118                         return NULL;
00119 
00120                 if (m_iStackPointer < 0) {
00121                         m_iStackPointer = -1;
00122                         return NULL;
00123                 }
00124 
00125                 void* retval = NULL;
00126                 retval = m_ptrVoidItems[m_iStackPointer];
00127 
00128                 m_iStackPointer--;
00129 
00130                 // ok
00131                 return retval;
00132         }
00133 }
